text: Jean Obeid (8 May 19398 February 2021) was a Lebanese journalist and politician. He was the Minister of Foreign Affairs and Emigrants from 2003 to 2004. Obeid served as a member of the parliament, representing Chouf from 1991 to 1992 and Tripoli from 1992 to 2005. Obeid was a candidate for President of Lebanon in the 2014 Lebanese presidential election. Obeid died on 8 February 2021 in Tripoli, Lebanon from COVID-19 at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Lebanese politicians Category:Lebanese journalists Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Lebanon
title: Jean Obeid
